::Cledar::

Cledar swore as his plasma cannon heated up, jumping backwards and
shaking it quickly. He stumbles back and manages to get out of
Sinnertwin's way, but he won't be able to fire from his cannon untill
it cools down.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Sinnertwin narrowly twisted his body sideways to avoid the blast,
part
> of his metal charring from it. "Ooooooooooh, I like food that fights
> back" one of the heads snarled. "Yesss, it more appetizing as it
wiggles
> down the throat" the other hissed, as they both then kept on
decending
> towards the ground, and fired a stream of heat each, this time
aiming at
> the plasma cannon.
